direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle the assignment of endpoint lists, focusing on different aspects (new vs. missing).
Both methods involve setting lists of changes, with similar control flows and state management.
Both methods update lists of changes, though they handle different types of changes (schemas vs. endpoints).

Setting the new specification is necessary to identify new endpoints.
Checking core changes is essential to determine if new endpoints are significant.
